title: RegistryChain
description: Registry protocol allows for both formation and lifecycle management. Since your legal entity is blockchain-native (borderless, permissionless, and its constitution reflected on a smart contract), you also benefit from seamlessly integrated second-order applications and services like governance, tokenization, DeFi along side traditional corporate services such as bank account openings, payment processing and more

title: Zefi.com - BlockChain education platform
description: ZeFi is a blockchain-centric Education & Media Marketing Start-Up aiming to humanize and gamify blockchain education for the masses. We seek to increase access, inclusion and empowerment for the unrepresented communities in the crypto-world, with a focus on Arabic-speaking communities by raising awareness and enabling knowledge exchange.

title: Al seeraj for Development and Healthcare
description: A website for a development and healthcare non-profit organization

title: Markcognition AI
description: A AI-powered platform for customer support and sales

title: Miftah media
description: A wordpress portfolio for a media company
